title: You wake up as a random champion (rules, and restrictions apply)

replies.body: {{champion:12}} honestly not sure what I could do, not very interesting.

Um... you just woke up as a **cow**... a cow that **heals **people... by screaming at them...

You're life must be really crazy, if that's no big deal to you XD
People in India would love you.
so would american but in a eat-you/reality-tv-shown kind of way
Hahaha He should become a DR. "WOULD YOU STOP YOUR GOD DAMN COMPLAINING ABOUT YOUR BROKEN SPINE?!?!"  The patient no longer has a broken spine.
{{champion:111}}  I wake up, and I just destroyed my entire house because i'm a two ton titan. Great. Well, at least I get a cool anchor.

I'm {{champion:24}}  Time to take off the Mask...

I'm... Outrageous.
Confirmed: Jax is Taric!

{{champion:75}} 
THE SANDS OF TIME WILL NOT HOLD ME BACK FROM MY TRUE PURPOSE.
*smacks alarm clock with staff*
IT IS TIME TO FEAST.
*chews on cereal*
9:00am - bark at newspaper man
10:00am - smash fire hydrant with staff
11:00am - smash clock-in at work with staff
12:30pm - smash lunch box with staff
5:00pm - smash clock-out at work with staff
7:00pm - play ARAM on League, get Renekton, smash computer tower with staff
7:20pm - get mad that I'm outlaning a Nasus with Renekton, become giant, smash keyboard with staff.
10:00pm - 2:00am - bark at random sounds
{{champion:38}} If i'm lucky, i'll be able to Riftwalk to the remote thats 254 units away.

{{champion:86}} MY HEART AND SWORD ALWAYS FOR DEMACIA!

...What do you mean, 'America'? The hell is that? 

NO I WILL NOT PUT MY SWORD AWAY. STOP POINTING THOSE GUNS AT ME FIRST. 

Look, I had no choice. He was threatening me! Of course I had to bring down Justice on him! .... Ok, maybe the spinning away was optional, BUT STILL.
{{champion:30}} : "Mom, I think I did the puberty wrong."
{{champion:53}}  I feel the need to go to a club and pull as many chicks to my side as possible and get them knocked them up with my E.
{{champion:4}} teleport to school in the morning, and back after school.

118, {{champion:83}}.

I can summon ghouls!  This gives me a collection of helpers I can count on to perform simple tasks for me, whether that be bringing groceries upstairs (Can't trust Ravenous with that though) or finding my television remote.  It also means I can make ghost-clones of people, which comes in great when I need to be in two places at once or need more than two hands to complete a task.  Probably won't make me too popular with the Church, though, and two of the ghouls have issues - Ravenous tends to eat all my snacks and Decaying smells like, well, death.  Spectral would be pretty chill, though.

If we factor the 'undead' side into this as well, it means that I don't need to eat, sleep, or breathe, which opens up a whole lot more time to do things.  I can recover from nearly any injury (albeit slowly) and I can't ever get sick.  Downsides there are that I really like eating and sleeping.  I think I could adapt, though.  And there won't be that usual 'undead smell' if I remember regular daily hygiene, which will be a lot easier with the extra eight hours a day I don't have to spend sleeping.  Immortality might get old after a while, though.  We'd have to see.

I dare say I'd really luck out with this one.
{{champion:6}}  :C

{{champion:4}} 

HELLO WORLD POKER TOUR
{{champion:98}} I. Will. **NEVER **DIE!
Famous last words

{{champion:11}} I've got crazy sword skills and I can just kind of...float and meditate to heal if I get hurt.
I doubt there's any form of hard CC in the real world's military, since they're all about killing not disabling. I think I'll take over the world.
Stun-guns, friend. Stun-guns.
Aw. Crap.
{{champion:96}} I am now the best puppy the world will ever see
fricking turtle.{{champion:33}}
(Armadillo)
Sion. I am now best linebacker in the league.

{{champion:13}} 
I sure appreciate my big scroll ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:18}}  Great. now I'm smurf with a giant gun. I'm almost ok with that, almost.

{{champion:126}} 

I'm so charming and handsome that it's just a bonus I have such a huge stick. Pretty sure I get free drinks at the gay bars, become a famous actor and be named the Sexiest Man Alive in the near future. Also, pretty positive my father now is George Clooney.
{{champion:68}} I'm now really short (biggest change), I can actually grow a real beard now, and I'm good with machines and building things. Basically, a short testosterone filled version of me...

Heimerdinger. Talk about a bad hair day...

I guess with my super smarts I work on new weaponry to sell to the gov't and retire at 25 with millions of dollars. Not until Obama is out of office tho, who knows what he would do with them -.-
But the donger's hair is just so FABULOUS.
{{champion:103}} OH MY GOD. I have... tails... I get to go charm innocent people? :D Score.
Sure we get the magic part, but do we also get to be the sexiest whateverthehells alive?

{{champion:36}}  it is! I guess I'd have to take up my job at corporate. No but I guess I would run around lifting heavy stuff and throwing axes. I mean that's what Mundo does right? I suppose I would have to try not to get angry. That being sad I would get regenerative powers, so I could do lots of dangerous stuff, and then just heal. That'd be cool.
If I were you I'd just go where I please

{{champion:8}} okay, a blood mage. Probably when someone tries to murder me, I'll just pool and take only a couple pints of his blood so that he feels weak and I walk away, with all of the people looking at me in horror.
